Ferocity: Continue fighting below 0 HP
Immovable Blade: Cannot be involuntarily disarmed
Increased Damage Threshold: Continue fighting until -20 HP

Nonlethal Damage Reduction: Ignore first 9 points of non-lethal damage
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Retributive Rage: +16 attack and damage 1 rd after foe attack does 32 HP damage to self
Tunnel Fighting: No AC or attack penalty when squeezing
Two-Handed Focus: +1 attack using weapon two-handed
Unbreakable Blade: Ancestral weapon cannot be harmed
Unwavering Blade: Detect weapon if separated; if unconscious, weapon protects
